name: Senior Tech Executive
description: Leadership-focused template for CTOs, tech directors, and senior engineers. Conservative but modern design emphasising achievements and team management.

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.content: Visionary technology leader with 15+ years driving digital transformation for ASX-listed companies. Proven track record scaling engineering teams from 20 to 200+ professionals while delivering $50M+ in cost savings through cloud modernisation and process optimisation.

jobs.title: Chief Technology Officer
bullets: Lead technology strategy for $64B retail operation serving 28M+ customers weekly
Transformed legacy systems to cloud-native architecture, reducing operational costs by $25M annually
Built and scaled engineering organisation from 120 to 300+ professionals across 15 cross-functional teams
Spearheaded AI/ML initiatives improving supply chain efficiency and customer personalisation

jobs.title: Head of Engineering
bullets: Directed product engineering for realestate.com.au serving 3M+ monthly users
Implemented DevOps culture reducing deployment time from weeks to hours
Led technical due diligence for $200M+ acquisitions and strategic partnerships
Established offshore development centres in India and Philippines

sections.title: Key Achievements
achievements: Reduced technology operational costs by $50M+ across multiple organisations
Successfully led 5 major digital transformation initiatives
Built high-performing engineering teams totalling 500+ professionals
Delivered 20+ enterprise-scale products serving millions of users
